title: Rioter can you explain
body:
So basically going through the patch notes and there was something that just isn't clicking because of the wording.

>HEXTECH MASTERY; Combine Mastery tokens for a specific champ with that champ’s crafting shard, permanent loot, or blue essence to unlock their next mastery level

Is this saying that to get level 6/7 mastery we have to unlock a chest with that champion in it?

Because holy shit is that a stupid idea, because not only is this giving us skins and champions, but there are 130 champions, and we have to be lucky to pull the champion we want.

replies.body: No, you can just use Blue Essence.

Even if you can do it with blue essence the system is still retarded it should just be about S games none of this crafting stuff now practically anyone can go from  5-7 in a handful of games and a bit of ip spent

**Combine Mastery tokens** Earned by gaining an S-, S, S+ rank for level 6 & S, S+ rank for level 7

**Combine Mastery tokens for a specific champ with that champ’s crafting shard, permanent loot, or blue essence to unlock their next mastery level** 
The key word being OR here, you do not need the champ shard. You can get the mastery rank using your earned tokens and blue essence. People have been asking for a blue essence sink for a while, especially those who already own all the champions. This is it.

**We’re adding a new mystery champ item to the store for RP or IP in a future patch that’ll help offset the RNG of finding champ shards and permanents in chests** 
They're making it even easier to get champ shards and permanents so you can spam your high level emote faster.
